title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, May 24, 2022
description: “There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.” – Joseph Brodsky, poet, born on this day in 1940.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.” – Joseph Brodsky, poet, born on this day in 1940.
